hero_description: Our goal is for every entrepreneur to build their business consciously through education, environment, and responsibility. Knowledge turns into systematic solutions, and energy into results.
swiper_card_1_item: Designed for big impact — ready to go global
swiper_card_1_describe: Through MIX, new markets and international collaboration opportunities open up by connecting to country networks.
swiper_card_2_describe: MIX opens doors to new markets and international collaboration by connecting to country networks.
swiper_card_section_item: What can we offer to entrepreneurs?

packages.title: Standard Package
packages.details: Basic analytics, customer support, limited features. Perfect for individuals and small teams.

packages.title: Business Package
packages.details: Full analytics, priority support, advanced tools and integrations for growing businesses.

packages.title: Premium Package
packages.details: Automation tools, API access, unlimited features, VIP support. Best for scaling companies.
